CustomField.defaultValue:
IF( $RecordType.Name == 'RFP (Exhibition or Event)', 'Can you provide the client’s corporate identity & show theme style guide? If not, is the show theme development & experience expected within the RFP?',
IF( $RecordType.Name == 'Sold Event', 'Can you provide the client’s corporate identity & show theme style guide? If not, is the show theme development and experience expected within your request?',
IF( $RecordType.Name == 'Sold Exhibition', 'Can you provide an overview of the event experience, strategy, and an event theme style guide? If not, is the show theme development & experience expected within your request?', 'Record type not found') ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provide client’s corporate identity & show theme style guide otherwise, analyze if an RFP relation exist?
CustomField.label: Project Brief Question 1
